details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.2.3 Extension schemas - Extension schema Field type

rule.test: (isNameValidText == true && namePrefix == "pdfaField" ) && (isValueTypeValidText == true && isValueTypeDefined == true && valueTypePrefix == "pdfaField" ) && (isDescriptionValidText == true && descriptionPrefix == "pdfaField" )

error.message: Invalid extension schema Field type definition
